text: The SEAT Córdoba is a car produced by SEAT in two generations from 1993 until 2009. == First generation (1993–2002) == === Versions === File:SEAT Cordoba Sport de blanco.jpg|2-door saloon (Córdoba SX) File:Seat Cordoba front 20071119.jpg|4-door saloon (Córdoba) File:Cordobavario.jpg|5-door station wagon (Córdoba Vario) === Engines === ==== Petrol ==== * 1.4 44 kW (60 hp) * 1.4 16V 55 kW (75 hp) and 74 kW (100 hp) * 1.6 55 kW (75 hp) and 74 kW (100 hp) * 1.8 66 kW (90 hp) * 1.8 16V 95 kW (129 hp) * 1.8 20V Turbo 115 kW (156 hp) * 2.0 85 kW (115 hp) * 2.0 16V 110 kW (150 hp) ==== Diesel ==== * 1.9 D 47 kW (64 hp) and 50 kW (68 hp) * 1.9 SDI 47 kW (64 hp) and 50 kW (68 hp) * 1.9 TD 55 kW (75 hp) * 1.9 TDI 66 kW (90 hp) and 81 kW (110 hp) == Second generation (2002–2009) == === Engines === ==== Petrol ==== * 1.2 12V 47 kW (64 hp) and 51 kW (69 hp) * 1.4 16V 55 kW (75 hp), 63 kW (85 hp) and 74 kW (100 hp) * 1.6 16V 77 kW (105 hp) ==== Diesel ==== * 1.4 TDI 51 kW (69 hp), 55 kW (75 hp) and 59 kW (80 hp) * 1.9 SDI 47 kW (64 hp) * 1.9 TDI 74 kW (101 hp) and 96 kW (131 hp) Cordoba Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles
title: SEAT Córdoba
